snippet: John Utendahl, who was most recently a vice chairman at Deutsche Bank, will join in October as an executive vice chairman of global and investment banking.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: John Utendahl, who was most recently a vice chairman at Deutsche Bank, will join in October as an executive vice chairman of global and investment banking.

headline.main: Bank of America Merrill Lynch Hires a Senior Banker
